summary: WHEN IT RAINS THE BRAKES WILL NOT GRAB AND HOLD.  LOUD HOWLING NOISE FROM THE FRONT BRAKES.  THE WHOLE CAR SHUDDERS HARD AS IF IT WILL FALL OFF OF IT'S FRAME.  PADS AND ROTORS HAVE BEEN REPLACED FOUR TIMES IN A YEAR.  DEALER WON'T CHECK ANYTHING ELSE AND SAYS GM WON'T AUTHORIZE THE WARRANTY WORK! TS
